product_name: Isis Dream Placket T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Isis Dream Placket shirt adds stylish details to a tee that's already functional, setting it apart from the rest. Cotton-slub fabric is accented with faux shell buttons and a raw edge at the neck. Cotton fabric is naturally soft, breathable and comfortable. 3/4-length roll-up sleeves; small chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Isis Dream Placket shirt adds stylish details to a tee that's already functional, setting it apart from the rest. Cotton-slub fabric is accented with faux shell buttons and a raw edge at the neck.
